name: Beef with mushroom
description: Indulge in this high-protein, low-carb Beef with Mushroom recipe that's perfect for those looking to enjoy a healthy but flavorful meal. Packed with succulent beef sukiyaki meat and juicy button mushrooms, this dish is a delicious way to maintain a healthy diet without compromising on taste. Ideal for anyone seeking healthified recipes that are low in sugar and high in satisfaction.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the ingredients: Thinly slice the beef sukiyaki meat if not already sliced. Finely chop the garlic and red onion. Rinse the water cress and button mushrooms.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Season the beef slices with salt, black pepper, and lemon juice. Let them marinate for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, melt the butter over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the garlic and red onion to the pan and saut√© until they are soft and fragrant, about 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Increase the heat to high, add the marinated beef slices to the pan and cook until they are browned on each side, about 2-3 minutes per side.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Add the button mushrooms to the pan and cook until they are soft, about 4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Once the mushrooms are cooked, add the water cress and cook until wilted, about 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the beef and mushrooms hot, optionally with ginisang pechay on the side.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
